name: SUMOSUMO
description:
What?

SUMOSUMO (pronounced SuMosUmO) is a feverish, fun, hilarious two-player fighting game with ragdoll sumo characters!

How to play?

Player 1 - WASD (Tap W twice to double jump, and hold S in air to go down fast)

Player 2 - Arrows (Tap Up twice to double jump, and hold Down in air to go down fast)
